Name: Secret Diaries: Manage a Manor
About the game: To receive her mysterious inheritance, Jane, a maiden too bright for her time, must find a husband before the season ends. But this is no easy feat! In a new environment, she must not only earn an impeccable reputation and learn how to live in high society but she must also see through the many plots unfolding before her. Will Jane lead a single life of her own or will she find a partner for life? If so - will he be a kind and gallant heir? A distant, yet insanely intelligent widower? Or maybe an unscrupulous officer who wants to live life to the fullest? One thing is for certain: among the conspiracies, rumors, and slander, Jane must not only find someone who is ready to marry her, but above all else, she must fight for her own happiness. Even at the risk of her own reputation… FEATURES: ❤️ Support Jane in her fight for happiness, love and wealth. ❤️ Choose between three handsome bachelors. ❤️ Enjoy 60 levels of engaging storyline. ❤️ Explore the world of 19th-century conventions in five colorful locations filled with charismatic characters! ❤️ Prove your dexterity and smarts in five mini-games. ❤️ Break traditions by playing a strong female character who cares about others. The heroines can save themselves! ❤️ Choose from three available difficulty levels. ❤️ Don’t waste your time and fight to be happy before the season ends!
